description: Provides a NS1 Monitoring Job resource. This can be used to create, modify, and delete monitoring jobs.

Comparison.description: The comparison to perform on the the output.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

Active.description: Indicates if the job is active or temporarily disabled.

Config.description: A configuration dictionary with keys and values depending on the jobs' type.

Frequency.description: The frequency, in seconds, at which to run the monitoring job in each region.

JobType.description:
The type of monitoring job to be run. See NS1 API
docs for supported values.

Name.description: The free-form display name for the monitoring job.

Notes.description: Freeform notes to be included in any notifications about this job.

NotifyDelay.description: The time in seconds after a failure to wait before sending a notification.

NotifyFailback.description: If true, a notification is sent when a job returns to an "up" state.

NotifyList.description: The id of the notification list to send notifications to.

NotifyRegional.description: If true, notifications are sent for any regional failure (and failback if desired), in addition to global state notifications.

NotifyRepeat.description: The time in seconds between repeat notifications of a failed job.

Policy.description:
The policy for determining the monitor's global status
based on the status of the job in all regions. See NS1 API docs for supported values.

RapidRecheck.description: If true, on any apparent state change, the job is quickly re-run after one second to confirm the state change before notification.

Regions.description:
The list of region codes in which to run the monitoring
job. See NS1 API docs for supported values.
